body:
Nick Devlin wrote:
Just so you know, you can change parameters within rvu without
restarting.  Simply type 'set' at the command line in rvu, and you will
be presented with all the options.  Typing 'set', 'ab', '1' and then
'new' will regenerate the view with the new ambient setting.

- Rob
subject: [Radiance-general] Testing -B -R in gensky
